translation:
Tell me Your Excellency

From Your Excellency Almeida

Attentive to the needs of the State, I understand that it can be granted to him that as soon as the circumstances that now weaken the Treasury, with the urgent expenses of the war, the Petitioner will be reimbursed, etc., etc....

B. G. Silva

Addressed to the President of the State. His residence.
